Schedule your waste collection now to get rid of your trash and garbage on your house or office!
Start collecting waste now and help people in need of waste management!
Our application will help you in your waste management problems whether you are a collector who wants to earn extra cash or a client who wants their waste to get rid of!
System will automatically selects a collector for you based on the preferred date
This application was made for educational purposes only.
